sentences.sentence: Don't you know what you've already done? You made me your friend, and, in doing so, you made a spider beautiful to everyone in that barn.
sentences.translation: 你不知道你为我做了多少吗？你让我成了你的朋友，正是如此，你让农庄的人都了解到了蜘蛛的美丽。

sentences.sentence: True self-discovery begins where your comfort zone ends.
sentences.translation: 真正的自我发现，始于你踏出了你的舒适区。

sentences.sentence: This is the "oasis" world, where the only limit is your own imagination.
sentences.translation: 这是“绿洲”世界，在这里唯一限制你的是你自己的想象力。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes things don't work out the way you thought they would.
My rich dad taught me a lesson I have carried all my life and that was the necessity of being charitable or giving.
sentences.translation: 富爸爸教给我一生受用的经验，即乐善好施是必要的。
